name: PSYCHO BAT
description:
Everything is a bullet when you're an Esper. Rip the souls out of your enemies and shoot them with your baseball bat. Do parkour too if you feel like it. Resurrect your mortal coil when you inevitably die. Compete against the clock to see how fast you can kill everything in your path.

CONTROLS

WASD - Move
Left Mouse - Swing
Right Mouse - Pull
Shift - Dodge
C / Ctrl - Crouch & Slide
Space - Jump
